text:
In my treatment I think it comes out naturally:

<https://mitmath.github.io/18337/lecture10/estimation_identification>

because the pullback is a function of the pushforward variables and it's not computed until later. There's really only a few sensible ways to compute that.

I might quote that in the introduction that’s a pretty good way to say it
